question: What is the number of disaster projects starting later than 2021?
sub_query: number of disaster projects starting later than 2021
final_answer: The number of disaster projects starting later than 2021 is not available as of the October 27, 2021, Public Works Commission Meeting. The meeting did not discuss any disaster projects starting after 2021, and the agenda report did not mention any upcoming projects beyond the current ones. Therefore, the specific number of disaster projects starting later than 2021 is not provided in the given context.
sub_answers: As of the October 27, 2021, Public Works Commission Meeting, there were no disaster projects starting later than 2021 discussed. Additionally, the agenda report did not mention any upcoming disaster projects beyond the current ones being worked on. Therefore, the exact number of disaster projects starting later than 2021 is not provided in the context.

Disaster Projects (Completed)

Citywide Guardrail Replacement
Project Description: This project consisted of replacing the damaged guardrails throughout
the City caused by the Woolsey Fire on Encinal Canyon Road, Corral Canyon Road, and
Kanan Dume Road. The project was combined with the County of Los Angeles’ damaged
guardrails. The project was completed in February 2021.
